name: Polymorph
flavor: Assume the form of a new creature.

purposeDescriptions.low: energy that converts the target creature into a random new creature that you have knowledge of. The target maintains their size, mass, intelligence, and casting ability.
purposeDescriptions.mid: energy that converts the target creature into a new creature of your choice for a time. The target maintains their size, mass, intelligence, and casting ability.
purposeDescriptions.high: energy that converts the target creature into a new creature of your choice semi-permanently. The target maintains their size, mass, intelligence, and casting ability.
